attributes.action: Theresa May must resign and let somebody who believes in Brexit lead our nation.
attributes.background: Theresa May is a Remainer and will not deliver on the referendum result.   A strong leader is required who believes in our Great nation.  MP's who do not accept the referendum result are undemocratic and should also resign.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.
